item.title: Explaining Predictive Models
item.description: It is easy to build powerful predictive models in Orange. But how does the model “look like”? Which attributes and which values of those attributes are important? And when making predictions, which attributes contributed to the decision? Orange’s new Explain add-on helps you answer all those questions. Related: Explaining Models Go to Options –> Add-ons and install Explain add-on. Restart Orange for the add-on to appear. It only contains two widgets, but boy are they great!
